Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Bro Gwaun School, Fishguard, Pembrokeshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Lloyd Barnaby (euphonium) - BTM Next Generation Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 4 bands competed.
Sept. 19, 2014, 6:07 p.m. July 4, 2020, 12:41 p.m.
